item.title: Personal growth and the Python community
item.description:
Description

Personal growth and the Python community [EuroPython 2021 - Talk - 2021-07-30 - Brian] [Online]

By Yashasvi Misra

I owe both my personal and professional growth to communities. As an engineering student in computer science, the first open tech community I joined was PyLadies. I have since then been actively involved in the Python community, always trying to learn and grow. Little did I expect how beneficial that would be. In this session, I will share my journey with the Python community, the impact it had on me, and how it boosted my self-confidence. If you donâ€™t know where to start, join me to explore what I have learned so far.
